roleset.name: to direct the course
roleset.note: MANEUVER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'maneuver' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from maneuver.01-v predicate notes)

roles.note: Destination not seen for the noun thus far. (from maneuver.01-n)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: [*-1] Playing black in the first game , the human champion maneuvered Deep Thought , known [*]for its attacking prowess , into a totally passive position .
example.arg: Deep Thought , known [*] for its attacking prowess ,

example.name: maneuver his way
example.text: In August 1983 , [Mr. Noriega]-1 took over as General [*RNR*-2]and de-facto dictator [*RNR*-2] of Panama , [*] -1 having maneuvered his way to the top only two years after the mysterious death in a plane crash of his old boss Omar Torrijos .
example.arg: only two years after the mysterious death in a plane crash of his old boss Omar Torrijos

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: Instead of castling , a standard measure to safeguard the king , D.T. made a second - rate rook maneuver at move 13 ; then it put a knight offside on move 16 .
example.arg: Instead of casting, a standard measure to safeguard the king,
